name: Cosmos Defense
description:
Cosmos Defense is a strategy planetary defense game across the galaxy. Balance spending resources on improving your future position while having the resources right now to protect your territories. The goal is to uncover all the grids with minimal loses.

Between waves you will be
  • unlocking new grids
  • managing defenses
  • collecting resources
  • researching/upgrading technologies


The game is currently 30% complete. I have a good foundation to build this game out from. Apart from the UI the visuals of this game are getting close to a finished state. Most of the remaining time will focus on programming content and mechanics of the game.


The final build will release in February. I am at a point where I can take requests for adding new mechanics. Once early access starts I will be taking requests and releasing monthly builds.
